analysis.description:
Reentrancy in RCNCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#300-331):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= fundingStartTimestamp || preallocationsWhitelist.whitelist(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#303-304)
	- checkedSupply = token.totalSupply().add(tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#308-310)
	- require(bool)(checkedBought <= whiteList.whitelist(msg.sender) || preallocationsWhitelist.whitelist(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#314-315)
	- require(bool)(tokens >= minBuyTokens || (tokenCreationCap - token.totalSupply()) <= minBuyTokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#325-326)
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#326-327)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- bought (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#327-328)

Reentrancy in RCNCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#332-344):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp > fundingEndTimestamp || token.totalSupply() == tokenCreationCap) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#335-339)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#340)

Reentrancy in RCNCrowdsale.RCNCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#272-297):
	External calls:
	- assert(bool)(uint256(token.decimals()) == decimals) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#284-285)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- ethFundDeposit (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#286-289)
	- fundingEndTimestamp (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#294-295)

	- isFinalized (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#285)
	- rcnFundDeposit (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#289-290)

RCNCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#300-331) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp <= fundingEndTimestamp) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#304-305)
	- require(bool)(block.timestamp >= fundingStartTimestamp || preallocationsWhitelist.whitelist(msg.sender)) (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#303-304)

RCNCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_chucks/4/0xf8d81eb6c765397ecfadc3b396715267bb41f241.sol#332-344) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
